You can spend @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice in the following ways:

  • Synchronization of Chaos: When multiple creatures are rolling simultaneously for the same reason, including you, you can spend two @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to replace another creature’s roll result with one of your dice rolls.
    Alternatively, when you roll multiple dice at once, you can spend two @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to change the result of one die to the result of another die you rolled. 
    This change cannot trigger an Eikonic Number or Miracle for any creature involved.
